description:
Yolton is a hotel owner of a fine hotel located near Hyakokku City in the Kalos region. In an alternate timeline, on the opening day of his hotel, he was challenged to a Pok√©mon battle in which his Rotom fled the battlefield and he lost the battle. He made a deal with Mantle that if he lost the battle, he would give up his hotels ownership, which he ended up doing. He then became the hotel receptionist under Mantle.
Ash Ketchum and his friends travel back in time 10 years with the help of Yolton`s Rotom. They changed the past and created a new alternate future where Yolton was able to defeat Mantle in the battle and keep the ownership of the hotel. He then hired Mantle to work at his hotel.
name: Yolton
